inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis and management of miscarriage / pregnancy loss in the emergency department
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: patient was admitted to ED with abdominal pain related to miscarriage

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: patient experienced similar pain twice in the past year

exclusion.criterion: Subject unable to read or/and write
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 54-year-old obese woman with abdominal pain, nausea and vomiting. Ultrasound revealed gallstones, biliary sludge and CBD stones.
